Title: Explorers in Peril
Description:
Don't mistake the expedition's scholarly pursuits as timidness, $p.

We are not recluses studying books in far-off towers.

We are adventurers, hunting down knowledge first-hand in every corner of Azeroth!

That passion for adventure often leads us onto the path of perils and hazards, and a few expedition members have bitten off a little more than they could chew...
ObjectivesText: Rescue 3 Dragonscale Expedition members in the Wild Coast.
RewardText: The dragons are not here to meet us as Ebyssian said they would be...
